text.div:
TableHL70006toV3ReligiousAffiliation (http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/v2mappings/table-hl70006-to-v3-religiousaffiliation)

Mapping from HL70006 to http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ReligiousAffiliation

ACTIVE (not intended for production usage). Published on 2022-02-21 by HL7 International, Inc (HL7 Orders and Observations Workgroup: http://hl7.org/Special/committ..., Keith W. Boone: kboone@ainq.com). Copyright (c) 2020, HL7 International, Inc., All Rights Reserved.

This ConceptMap represents a mapping from the HL7 V2 Table HL70006 to the FHIR V3 ReligiousAffiliation Value Set.
